summary: Reed Fish's life turns into chaos when a high school crush returns to Mud Meadows on the eve of his marriage to the small town's sweetheart.
cast: Jay Baruchel|Alexis Bledel|Victor Rasuk|Schuyler Fisk|A.J. Cook|Katey Sagal|Chris Parnell|Shiri Appleby|Valerie Azlynn|DJ Qualls|Tommy Dewey|Blake Clark|Jim Cody Williams|Boti Bliss|Rossif Sutherland|David Beggs|Jackie Benoit|Domingo Vela|Trina Vela|Larry Agney|Diane Richards|Eugene Smith|Reed Fish|Andrew Stubblefield|Peter Alwazzan|Scott Laster|Paul West|Joseph Edward Medina|Todd Fjelsted
title: I'm Reed Fish
